name: EVOC Hip Pouch - Unisex
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description: Quick rip after work? Stash the bare essentials in the Hip Pouch and hit the trails. This stripped-down pack has enough room for your phone, snacks, multi-tool and emergency jacket.Main compartment is large enough to hold your phone, multi-tool and a compact rain jacket.Zippered side pockets and slip-in rear pockets hold bars, gels and other small items.Rear loop lets you clip on a blinky light for the ride home.Padded back and lots of mesh panels keep you cool and comfortable as you ride.
